title: Wide color gamut on Pixel 2
content: Hi everyone, I just bought a used Pixel 2. I'm wondering why my device does not seem to show wide color gamut images properly in Chrome or Google Photos? This brings me to another question, how to determine if my display is in fact original part? I guess it's also a possibility that the previous owner might already replaced it with a third party screen replacement. This is the screenshot from Display Tester.
